issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement castVARBINARY functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12378](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12378). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement the following functions:
 \* castVARBINARY(varchar, len)
 \* castVARBINARY(varbinary, len)
 \* castVARBINARY(float/double/int/bigint, bigint len)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12378?focusedCommentId=17370244) by Praveen Kumar (praveenbingo):*
